verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of all his <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>:
and he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is my <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>, and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>, even mine;

God <S%H430><s%>, my <S%H6697>rock<s%>, in him will I take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>; My <S%H4043>shield<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>, and my <S%H4498>refuge<s%>; My <S%H3467>saviour<s%>, thou <S%H3467>savest<s%> me from <S%H2555>violence<s%>.
I will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who is worthy to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>: So shall I be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
For the <S%H4867>waves<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>compassed<s%> <S%H5158>me<s%>; The floods of <S%H1100>ungodliness<s%> made me <S%H1204>afraid<s%>:
The <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> were round <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H4170>me<s%>; The snares of <S%H4194>death<s%> came upon <S%H6923>me<s%>.

In my <S%H6862>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; <S%H7121>Yea<s%>, I called unto my <S%H430>God<s%>: And he <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of his <S%H1964>temple<s%>, And my <S%H7775>cry<s%> came into his <S%H241>ears<s%>.

Then the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1607>shook<s%> and <S%H7493>trembled<s%>, The <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7264>quaked<s%> And were <S%H1607>shaken<s%>, because he was <S%H2734>wroth<s%>.

There went <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%>, And <S%H784>fire<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%>: <S%H1513>Coals<s%> were kindled by <S%H1197>it<s%>.
He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3381>also<s%>, and came down; And thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%> was under his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
And he <S%H7392>rode<s%> upon a <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and did <S%H5774>fly<s%>; <S%H7200>Yea<s%>, he was seen upon the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind<s%>.
And he <S%H7896>made<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H5521>pavilions<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H2841>him<s%>, Gathering of <S%H4325>waters<s%>, thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> of the <S%H7834>skies<s%>.
At the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> before him <S%H1513>Coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> were <S%H1197>kindled<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H7481>thundered<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, And the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>.
And he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H1300>them<s%>; Lightning, and discomfited <S%H2000>them<s%>.

Then the <S%H650>channels<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%>, The <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> were laid <S%H1540>bare<s%>, By the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, At the <S%H5397>blast<s%> of the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> from on <S%H4791>high<s%>, he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4871>me<s%>; He drew me out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>;
He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from my <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H341>enemy<s%>, From them that <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H553>me<s%>; for they were too mighty for me.
They came <S%H6923>upon<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H343>calamity<s%>; But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was my <S%H4937>stay<s%>.
He brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> also into a large <S%H4800>place<s%>; He <S%H2502>delivered<s%> <S%H2654>me<s%>, because he delighted in me.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>; According to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> hath he recompensed <S%H7725>me<s%>.
For I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And have not wickedly <S%H7561>departed<s%> from my <S%H430>God<s%>.
For all his <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> were before <S%H2708>me<s%>; And as for his statutes, I did not depart from <S%H5493>them<s%>.
I was also <S%H8549>perfect<s%> toward <S%H8104>him<s%>; And I kept myself from mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
Therefore hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me according to my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, According to my <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> in his <S%H5048>eyesight<s%>.
With the <S%H2623>merciful<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H2616>merciful<s%>; With the <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H8549>perfect<s%>;
With the <S%H1305>pure<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H1305>pure<s%>; And with the <S%H6141>perverse<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H6141>froward<s%>.
And the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> thou wilt <S%H3467>save<s%>; But thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are upon the <S%H7311>haughty<s%>, that thou mayest bring them <S%H8213>down<s%>.
For thou art my <S%H5216>lamp<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H5050>lighten<s%> my <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
For by thee I <S%H7323>run<s%> upon a <S%H1416>troop<s%>; By my <S%H430>God<s%> do I leap <S%H1801>over<s%> a <S%H7791>wall<s%>.

As for <S%H410>God<s%>, his <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect<s%>: The <S%H565>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H6884>tried<s%>; He is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> unto all them that take refuge in <S%H2620>him<s%>.
For who is <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H1107>save<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? And who is a <S%H6697>rock<s%>, <S%H1107>save<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>?
God <S%H410><s%> is my <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H2428>fortress<s%>; And he <S%H5425>guideth<s%> the <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in his <S%H1870>way<s%>.
He <S%H7737>maketh<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7737>like<s%> <S%H355>hinds<s%>' <S%H5975>feet<s%>, And setteth me upon my high <S%H1116>places<s%>.
He <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%>, So that mine <S%H2220>arms<s%> do <S%H5181>bend<s%> a <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>brass<s%>.
Thou hast also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; And thy <S%H6031>gentleness<s%> hath made me <S%H7235>great<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%> under <S%H7166>me<s%>; And my feet have not <S%H4571>slipped<s%>.
I have <S%H7291>pursued<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>; Neither did I turn again till they were <S%H3615>consumed<s%>.
And I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H4272>them<s%>, and smitten them <S%H6965>through<s%>, so that they cannot arise: <S%H5307>Yea<s%>, they are fallen under my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
For thou hast <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%> unto the <S%H4421>battle<s%>; Thou hast <S%H3766>subdued<s%> under me those that rose up against <S%H6965>me<s%>.
Thou hast also <S%H5414>made<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> turn their <S%H6203>backs<s%> unto <S%H6789>me<s%>, That I might cut off them that hate <S%H8130>me<s%>.
They <S%H8159>looked<s%>, but there was none to <S%H3467>save<s%>; Even unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, but he answered them <S%H6030>not<s%>.

Then did I <S%H7833>beat<s%> them small as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, I did <S%H1854>crush<s%> them as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%>, and did spread them <S%H7554>abroad<s%>.

Thou also hast <S%H6403>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H7379>strivings<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>; Thou hast <S%H8104>kept<s%> me to be the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: A <S%H5971>people<s%> whom I have not <S%H3045>known<s%> shall serve <S%H5647>me<s%>.
The <S%H1121>foreigners<s%> shall <S%H3584>submit<s%> themselves unto <S%H8085>me<s%>: As soon as they hear of <S%H8085>me<s%>, they shall obey me.
The <S%H1121>foreigners<s%> shall fade <S%H5034>away<s%>, And shall come <S%H2296>trembling<s%> out of their close <S%H4526>places<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>; And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be my <S%H6697>rock<s%>; And <S%H7311>exalted<s%> be <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>,
Even the <S%H410>God<s%> that executeth <S%H5414>vengeance<s%> for <S%H3381>me<s%>, And that bringeth down peoples under <S%H5971>me<s%>,

And that bringeth me <S%H3318>forth<s%> from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>: <S%H7311>Yea<s%>, thou liftest me up above them that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H5337>me<s%>; Thou deliverest me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
Therefore I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah, among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, And will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

Great <S%H4024><s%> <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> giveth he to his <S%H4428>king<s%>, And <S%H6213>showeth<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, To <S%H1732>David<s%> and to his <S%H2233>seed<s%>, <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
